committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy and Air Quality

official_title: To extend the deadline for commencement of construction of a hydroelectric project in the State of Ohio.
short_title: World War I Veterans Medal of Honor Justice Act

summary.text: Instructs the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission to: (1) extend to September 24, 2002, the time period during which a certain licensee is required to commence construction of a specified hydroelectric project in the State of Ohio; and (2) extend such time period for two consecutive two-year periods upon licensee request.Provides for reinstatement of such license if it has expired.

titles.title: World War I Veterans Medal of Honor Justice Act
To extend the deadline for commencement of construction of a hydroelectric project in the State of Ohio.
